on reading compounds: 採決【サイケツ】vote, ballot, division
伐採【バッサイ】felling timber, cutting down trees, logging, lumbering
kun reading compounds: 採る【とる】to adopt (method, proposal, etc.), to take (measure, course of action, etc.), to decide on, to pick (e.g. flowers), to gather (e.g. mushrooms), to catch (e.g. insects), to extract (e.g. juice), to take (e.g. a sample), to assume (an attitude), to take on (workers, students), to employ, to hire, to draw in (e.g. water), to let in (e.g. light from a window)
採るべき道【とるべきみち】course of action
